title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki - XWiki
content:
01:26 <polx\_> has joined #xwiki  
01:28 <polx> has quit  
01:28 <polx\_> is now known as <polx>  
01:38 <sdumitriu> has quit  
02:10 <+abusenius> happy new year everyone :)  
02:10 <abusenius> has quit  
04:26 <npm\_> has joined #xwiki  
04:30 <npm> has quit  
05:45 <jbrBridge> has quit  
05:45 <cjdelisle> has quit  
05:46 <user\_> has joined #xwiki  
05:46 <user\_> is now known as <cjdelisle>  
05:49 <user\_> has joined #xwiki  
05:49 <cjdelisle> is now known as <jbrBridge>  
05:50 <user\_> is now known as <cjdelisle>  
06:42 <Menso> has quit  
09:37 <npm\_> has quit  
09:39 <npm> has joined #xwiki  
09:41 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
09:46 <npm\_> has joined #xwiki  
09:50 <npm> has quit  
09:51 <sdumitriu> has quit  
10:18 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
10:23 <npm\_> is now known as <npm>  
11:30 <lpereira> has joined #xwiki  
12:27 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki  
13:51 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
14:37 <Menso> has joined #xwiki  
16:46 <Menso1> has joined #xwiki  
16:46 <Menso> has quit  
18:24 <DrLou> has joined #xwiki  
18:24 <DrLou> Happy New Year! Am I in the right place for XWiki Enterprise?  
18:50 <DrLou> Anybody here who can help with an initial connection to PostgreSQL?  
18:54 <@sdumitriu> Hi DrLou  
18:54 <@sdumitriu> Yes  
18:57 <@sdumitriu> Did you read http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/AdminGuide/InstallationPostgreSQL ?  
19:15 <DrLou> sdumitriu: Yes, indeed - diligently!  
19:15 <DrLou> but I'm not finding it possible to use it exactly...  
19:15 <DrLou> (is a restart of the domain required between each config change?)  
19:16 <@sdumitriu> Only changes in the configuration files (xwiki.cfg, xwiki.properties, hibernate.cfg.xml)  
19:17 <DrLou> I assume you're saying 'yes', must restart, if I change one of those files...?  So I better start doing this.  
19:17 <@sdumitriu> Yes, restart  
19:18 <DrLou> This is in GlassFish, btw...  
19:19 <mflorea> has quit  
19:20 <DrLou> OK, tks for your help. It was simply that I needed to restart to get things going. I thought I had a problem using a connection pool.  
19:20 <@sdumitriu> Did you also read http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/AdminGuide/InstallationGlassFish ?  
19:20 <DrLou> (Now, presumably, must install some 'sample' pages...)  
19:20 <@sdumitriu> Yes, download the XAR from http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/Main/Download  
19:21 <DrLou> Yes, I've read most (all?) readily-available docs. They don't exactly follow what one would now see using the GF 3.1 admin console.  
19:21 <DrLou> (I'd be happy to help edit the Wiki a bit...)  
19:24 <@sdumitriu> The registration is open  
19:24 <@sdumitriu> Please feel free to contribute  
19:48 <polx\_> has joined #xwiki  
19:48 <polx> has quit  
19:48 <polx\_> is now known as <polx>  
19:50 <polx> has quit  
21:21 <sdumitriu> has quit  
21:35 <lpereira> has quit  
21:36 <DrLou> Is xWiki an 'active' community?  
21:38 <@cjdelisle> Not sure how you define 'active' but I think it is.  
21:39 <@cjdelisle> Somewhat less active during the holidays though.  
21:42 <abusenius> has quit  
21:42 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki  
21:45 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
22:05 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
22:06 <DrLou> How would one, by default, import the sample pages xar file for xWiki - from the GlassFish 3.1 admin ?  
22:09 <@cjdelisle> http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/AdminGuide/Installation#HInstallingtheDefaultWikiXAR  
22:11 <DrLou> Thank You!  
22:13 <DrLou> (Good. I had been searching GF docs, thinking 'import' was a GF function...)  
22:13 <DrLou> noobie stuff, I know.  
22:14 <@cjdelisle> no pb.  
22:17 <DrLou> Another confusing thing for (most) noobs?: Link on the import page - saying the wiki is empty, is incorrect. Correct is: http://maven.xwiki.org/releases/org/xwiki/enterprise/xwiki-enterprise-wiki/2.7/xwiki-enterprise-wiki-2.7.xar  
22:20 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
22:20 <lucaa> has quit  
22:28 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
22:59 <florinciu> has joined #xwiki  
23:16 <DrLou> If we've already got GlassFish, where does the eXo platform fit into the mix - if at all?  
23:18 <@cjdelisle> It's another option for a platform. I'm not sure as to the level of support though.  
23:21 <DrLou> When you say 'another', do you mean as an \_alternative\_ to GlassFish?  Or does it run inside GF?  
23:23 <@cjdelisle> I'm not sure if exo runs on top of a servlet or if it is standalone.  
23:24 <mflorea> has quit  
23:25 <@cjdelisle> From xwiki's perspective, it is a separate platform which insulates xwiki from the rest of the system.  
23:51 <florinciu> has quit  
23:51 <Enygma`> has quit  
23:56 <abusenius> has quit  
23:59 <evalica> has quit
